data.title: Croatia Population, 1960
data.meta_description: In 2023, population for Croatia was 3.83 million persons. Population of Croatia fell gradually from 4.49 million persons in 1974 to 3.83 million persons in 2023. Total population is based on the de facto definition of population, which counts all residents regardless of legal status or citizenship--except for refugees not permanently settled in the country of asylum, who are generally considered part of the population of their country of origin. The values shown are midyear estimates.
data.text:
What is population?

Total population is based on the de facto definition of population, which counts all residents regardless of legal status or citizenship--except for refugees not permanently settled in the country of asylum, who are generally considered part of the population of their country of origin. The values shown are midyear estimates.
